title: RPG Creatures Voice Sound Effects
description: RPG Creatures is a voice sound effects pack with six creature types specially designed for RPG enemies with focus on horror..
longDescription:
RPG Creatures is a voice sound effects pack focused on monster enemies, features six monster types and 30 sounds for each monster with the basic articulations of an enemy such as attack, hit, faint, idle and other miscellaneous sounds to a total of 191 sounds including extras.


Click here to listen to the audio preview!


Goblin - This section is designed for a small humanoid creature with quirky features.

Orc - The orc vocalizations are intended to represent a a warrior like supersized humanoid.

Insectoid - This section features sounds for an agile insect mutation.

Beast - The beast vocalizations are inspired by wolf-like monsters and four-legged creatures.

Ghoul - These vocalizations are intended to represent an undead ghost like creature.

Troll - This section is intended for a slow paced giant monster.


Each monster type features 30 sound effects:


6-Hits (To represent the creature in pain absorbing an attack)

6-Attacks (To represent the creature executing an attack)

6-Idle Sounds (General sounds that indicate the creature's presence)

6-Faint Sounds (Sounds that signal that the creature is effectively eliminated)

6-Miscellaneous Sounds (This section features various sounds that are particular to each creature such as the laughter of the Goblin or the war calls of the Orcs)


EXTRAS

The RPG Creatures SFX pack also includes 10 combat & damage sound effects and a battle music loop.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Six creature types
  •  180 creatures SFX
  •  10 Combat sounds
  • 1 Battle music loop

Number of Audio Waves: 191

Number of Audio Cues: 191

Sample rate / bit rate: (Music 44.100 stereo) (SFX-22.050 mono)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: 07:44
